summary: As voice actor Ashleigh Ball prepares to visit Bronycon, the unusual fandom of My Little Pony: La magia de la amistad (2010) is explored.
cast: Ashleigh Ball|David Beckingham|Mike Bernstein|Phoe Of Equestria Daily|Jordan Downs|Patrick Edwards|Will Edwards|Benjamin Humphrey|Andrea Libman|Meghan McCarthy|Bryan Mischke|Nicole Oliver|Marsha H. Redden|Donald Rhoades|Shaun Scotellaro|Andy Stein|David Vertesi|Kelvin Williams
title: A Brony Tale
